holidays.title: Short Girl Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Don’t come up short on ways to celebrate the small ladies in your life!

holidays.title: Winter Solstice
holidays.description: You'll see gradually shorter nights and longer days

holidays.title: Anne and Samantha Day
holidays.description: Today, we’re going to learn about two important women in history right here at National Today.

holidays.title: Blue Christmas Service
holidays.description: Blue Christmas services are held to reassure the bereft that there is the hope of resurrection.

holidays.title: December Solstice
holidays.description: The nights only get longer from here. But take heart because the sun’s return is imminent.

holidays.title: Don’t Make Your Bed Day
holidays.description: Uncover the many reasons why you should not be making your bed each day.

holidays.title: Dongzhi
holidays.description: Discover the origins of Dongzhi and how people of Chinese descent celebrate around the world.

holidays.title: Humbug Day
holidays.description: Let out the stress before Christmas. Say “Bah, Humbug!”

holidays.title: International Dalek Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Put on your Dalek-inspired costumes, and get ready to exterminate!

holidays.title: Look On The Bright Side Day
holidays.description: We can’t always be optimistic but today we try our best to be!

holidays.title: National Armagnac Day
holidays.description: Armagnac is a craft spirit that both connoisseurs and novice drinkers appreciate.

holidays.title: National Crossword Puzzle Day
holidays.description: Find one you like and start filling in those squares!

holidays.title: National Flashlight Day
holidays.description: Along with bringing the longest night, the winter solstice brings with it National Flashlight Day.

holidays.title: National French Fried Shrimp Day
holidays.description: Seafood lovers across the nation rejoice on National French Fried Shrimp Day.

holidays.title: National Homeless Persons’ Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Proper housing is vital to every individual’s well-being, safety, and health. Support the vulnerable today.

holidays.title: National Maine Day
holidays.description: Today, feast your senses on all of the beauty Maine offers. There is something for everyone!

holidays.title: Phileas Fogg Win a Wager Day
holidays.description: This day commemorates a date in fictional history.

holidays.title: São Tomé Day
holidays.description: São Tomé and Príncipe was a busy colony of Portugal before its independence.

holidays.title: World Snowboard Day
holidays.description: Wax your snowboard while we get you ready for some wild shenanigans on the slopes.

holidays.title: Yule
holidays.description: Yule holiday is here, and it’s time to celebrate the rebirth of light.

holidays.title: Chris Heria’s Birthday
holidays.description: His lifestyle choices and tips have helped the mental and physical health of many!

holidays.title: Frank Zappa’s Birthday
holidays.description: A skilled lover of the most esoteric genres of rock and roll and rhythm and blues.

holidays.title: Hubert Keller’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented chef and author has burst his way forth into the limelight!

holidays.title: Jane Fonda’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today is the perfect opportunity to honor the legendary actress, Jane Fonda.

holidays.title: Jessie James Combs’s Birthday
holidays.description: This aspiring model and celebrity family member is climbing the ladder of success.

holidays.title: Jinger Duggar’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jinger Duggar is a clear fan favorite out of all the famous Duggar kiddos!

holidays.title: Kiefer Sutherland’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s to a legendary performer who has earned his place in the world of acting.

holidays.title: Mario Selman’s Birthday
holidays.description: YouTuber, TikToker, Instagrammer, and influencer — find out all about Mario Selman, the social media prodigy!

holidays.title: Mickey Singh’s Birthday
holidays.description: From India to the U.S., he is making a name for himself with his music!

holidays.title: Mike Vitar’s Birthday
holidays.description: A brave man dares to make choices and take risks; that’s the legacy of Michael Vitar

holidays.title: Nick Davis Weinstein’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikTok sensation is one of the best there is in the field.

holidays.title: Samuel L. Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: One of the renowned black American producers, a highly prolific actor, and Hollywood's most bankable star.
